abilities.name: Burden of Time.
abilities.description: Beasts and humanoids, other than shadar-kai, have disadvantage on saving throws while within 10 feet of the gloom weaver.

abilities.name: Fey Ancestry.
abilities.description: The gloom weaver has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The gloom weaver's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: arcane eye, mage armor, speak with dead
* 1/day each: arcane gate, bane, compulsion, confusion, true seeing

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The gloom weaver is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma. It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
* Cantrips (at will): minor illusion, prestidigitation, chill touch (3d8 damage), eldritch blast (3 beams +4 bonus to each damage roll)
* 5th level (3 slots): armor of Agathys, blight, darkness, dream, invisibility, fear, hypnotic pattern, major image, contact other plane, vampiric touch, witch bolt
